name: One Step Ahead
description: One Step Ahead is a multiplayer simulation game where you can choose to play the role of a fugitive, military or a K-9 unit. A simulative approach is warmly recommended, as you embrace your chosen role think strategically to succeed.As a fugitiveYou need to complete your goal while staying staying alive. You will be tracked down so hide in the shadows and lose your tracks. Even better: learn how to use them to ambush the pursuers.As a K-9 unitEveryone counts on you and your K-9 to track down the fugitives. Treat your dog as the precious resource they are, and ensure that they don't get harmed. Without them, it'd be almost impossible to find the fugitives in these dense forests.As a militaryYou know what to do, and you know it well. You're the backbone of this chase, and you won't fail.
